data.sunServiceSchema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<ServicesConfiguration><Service name="iPlanetAMAuthOpenIdConnectService" version="1.0"><Schema i18nFileName="amAuthOpenIdConnect"  i18nKey="openidconnect-service-description"  resourceName="openidconnect"  revisionNumber="10"  serviceHierarchy="/DSAMEConfig/authentication/iPlanetAMAuthOpenIdConnectService" >

            <Organization hideConfigUI="no" >
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="RequiredValueValidator"  syntax="string"  type="validator" >
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>com.sun.identity.sm.RequiredValueValidator</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="header_name"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="openam-auth-openidconnect-header-name"  order="400"  resourceName="idTokenHeaderName"  syntax="string"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator" >
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>oidc_id_token</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="issuer_name"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="openam-auth-openidconnect-issuer-name"  order="500"  resourceName="idTokenIssuer"  syntax="string"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator" >
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>accounts.google.com</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="crypto_context_type"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="openam-auth-openidconnect-crypto-context-type"  order="200"  resourceName="cryptoContextType"  syntax="string"  type="single_choice"  validator="RequiredValueValidator" >
                    <ChoiceValues>
                        <ChoiceValue>.well-known/openid-configuration_url</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue>jwk_url</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue>client_secret</ChoiceValue>
                    </ChoiceValues>
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>.well-known/openid-configuration_url</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="crypto_context_value"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="openam-auth-openidconnect-crypto-context-value"  order="300"  resourceName="cryptoContextValue"  syntax="string"  type="single" >
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>https://accounts.google.com/.well-known/openid-configuration</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="client_secret"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-auth-oauth-client-secret"  order="301"  resourceName="clientSecret"  syntax="password"  type="single" >
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="account_provider_class"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="openam-auth-openidconnect-account-provider-class"  order="100"  resourceName="accountProviderClass"  syntax="string"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator" >
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.common.mapping.DefaultAccountProvider</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="principal_mapper_class"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="openam-auth-openidconnect-principal-mapper-class"  order="900"  resourceName="principalMapperClass"  syntax="string"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator" >
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.oidc.JwtAttributeMapper</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>

                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="jwt_to_local_attr_mappings"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="openam-auth-openidconnect-jwt-to-local-attribute-mappings"  order="600"  resourceName="jwtToLdapAttributeMappings"  syntax="string"  type="list"  validator="RequiredValueValidator" >
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>sub=uid</Value>
                        <Value>email=mail</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>

                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="listed_audience_name"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="openam-auth-openidconnect-audience-name"  order="700"  resourceName="audienceName"  syntax="string"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator" >
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>example</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>

                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="listed_authorized_parties"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="openam-auth-openidconnect-accepted-authorized-parties"  order="800"  resourceName="acceptedAuthorizedParties"  syntax="string"  type="list"  validator="RequiredValueValidator" >
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>AuthorizedPartyExample</Value>
                        <Value>http://www.example.com/authorized/party</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>

                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="useSubClaimIfNoMatch"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="useSubClaimIfNoMatch"  order="1000"  syntax="boolean"  type="single" >
                    <BooleanValues>
                        <BooleanTrueValue i18nKey="i18nTrue" >true</BooleanTrueValue>
                        <BooleanFalseValue i18nKey="i18nFalse" >false</BooleanFalseValue>
                    </BooleanValues>
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>false</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>

                <SubSchema hideConfigUI="no"  inheritance="multiple"  maintainPriority="no"  name="serverconfig"  realmCloneable="yes"  resourceName="USE-PARENT"  supportsApplicableOrganization="no"  validate="yes" >
                    <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="RequiredValueValidator"  syntax="string"  type="validator" >
                        <DefaultValues>
                            <Value>com.sun.identity.sm.RequiredValueValidator</Value>
                        </DefaultValues>
                    </AttributeSchema>
                    <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="header_name"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="openam-auth-openidconnect-header-name"  order="400"  resourceName="idTokenHeaderName"  syntax="string"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator" >
                        <DefaultValues>
                            <Value>oidc_id_token</Value>
                        </DefaultValues>
                    </AttributeSchema>
                    <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="issuer_name"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="openam-auth-openidconnect-issuer-name"  order="500"  resourceName="idTokenIssuer"  syntax="string"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator" >
                        <DefaultValues>
                            <Value>accounts.google.com</Value>
                        </DefaultValues>
                    </AttributeSchema>
                    <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="crypto_context_type"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="openam-auth-openidconnect-crypto-context-type"  order="200"  resourceName="cryptoContextType"  syntax="string"  type="single_choice"  validator="RequiredValueValidator" >
                        <ChoiceValues>
                            <ChoiceValue>.well-known/openid-configuration_url</ChoiceValue>
                            <ChoiceValue>jwk_url</ChoiceValue>
                            <ChoiceValue>client_secret</ChoiceValue>
                        </ChoiceValues>
                        <DefaultValues>
                            <Value>.well-known/openid-configuration_url</Value>
                        </DefaultValues>
                    </AttributeSchema>
                    <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="crypto_context_value"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="openam-auth-openidconnect-crypto-context-value"  order="300"  resourceName="cryptoContextValue"  syntax="string"  type="single" >
                        <DefaultValues>
                            <Value>https://accounts.google.com/.well-known/openid-configuration</Value>
                        </DefaultValues>
                    </AttributeSchema>
                    <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="client_secret"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-auth-oauth-client-secret"  order="301"  resourceName="clientSecret"  syntax="password"  type="single" >
                    </AttributeSchema>
                    <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="account_provider_class"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="openam-auth-openidconnect-account-provider-class"  order="100"  resourceName="accountProviderClass"  syntax="string"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator" >
                        <DefaultValues>
                            <Value>org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.common.mapping.DefaultAccountProvider</Value>
                        </DefaultValues>
                    </AttributeSchema>
                    <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="principal_mapper_class"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="openam-auth-openidconnect-principal-mapper-class"  order="900"  resourceName="principalMapperClass"  syntax="string"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator" >
                        <DefaultValues>
                            <Value>org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.oidc.JwtAttributeMapper</Value>
                        </DefaultValues>
                    </AttributeSchema>

                    <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="jwt_to_local_attr_mappings"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="openam-auth-openidconnect-jwt-to-local-attribute-mappings"  order="600"  resourceName="jwtToLdapAttributeMappings"  syntax="string"  type="list"  validator="RequiredValueValidator" >
                        <DefaultValues>
                            <Value>sub=uid</Value>
                            <Value>email=mail</Value>
                        </DefaultValues>
                    </AttributeSchema>

                    <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="listed_audience_name"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="openam-auth-openidconnect-audience-name"  order="700"  resourceName="audienceName"  syntax="string"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator" >
                        <DefaultValues>
                            <Value>example</Value>
                        </DefaultValues>
                    </AttributeSchema>

                    <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="listed_authorized_parties"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="openam-auth-openidconnect-accepted-authorized-parties"  order="800"  resourceName="acceptedAuthorizedParties"  syntax="string"  type="list"  validator="RequiredValueValidator" >
                        <DefaultValues>
                            <Value>AuthorizedPartyExample</Value>
                            <Value>http://www.example.com/authorized/party</Value>
                        </DefaultValues>
                    </AttributeSchema>

                    <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="useSubClaimIfNoMatch"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="useSubClaimIfNoMatch"  order="1000"  syntax="boolean"  type="single" >
                        <BooleanValues>
                            <BooleanTrueValue i18nKey="i18nTrue" >true</BooleanTrueValue>
                            <BooleanFalseValue i18nKey="i18nFalse" >false</BooleanFalseValue>
                        </BooleanValues>
                        <DefaultValues>
                            <Value>false</Value>
                        </DefaultValues>
                    </AttributeSchema>
                </SubSchema>
            </Organization>
        </Schema></Service></ServicesConfiguration>
